name: Oath (Event Horizon School)
description:
Oath is a single player hack ‘n’ slash isometric game where you can play as Aya, once a samurai, who fights to bring back peace after a great curse was cast upon the world. Using her special kusarigama – able to turn blood into light – will you be able to face evil spirits, demons, and fight the darkness of the Blood Moon?

●             Clear your path from enemies: use your kusarigama to grab and kill your opponents

●             Oath world is cursed by a Blood Moon: every single shadow of the environment will hurt you

●             Collect light spheres to perform powerful light attacks that will cut the shadows around you

Notes: Gamepad is required to play this game.
